name: Gargoyle's Quest II: The Demon Darkness
synopsis: Firebrand the gargoyle returns in this NES™ prequel to the gothic Game Boy™ hit. As a young demon-in-training, Firebrand is entrusted to defeat an evil, dark light that threatens his home. Part platformer, part role-playing game, Gargoyle’s Quest II features overhead map-style adventure elements and side-scrolling action elements. Increase Firebrand’s abilities as you progress; improving your flying, jumping and magic power. Explore the realm, collect items and battle bosses, and vanquish the ultimate evil!
